mapper.insert: insert into students(userid, password, name, birthday, reg_date, profile_image, sub_num, gender) values (#{userid}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{regDate}, #{profileImage}, #{subNum}, #{gender})
mapper.select: select a.stu_num stuNum, a.userid, a.password, a.name, a.birthday, a.reg_date regDate, a.profile_image profileImage, a.sub_num subNum, a.gender from (select * from ${tname} order by stu_num desc) a limit ${startRow}, ${pageSize};
